title: @RIOT Lore Team - Where do Global Ultimates go?
body:
Hey guys,
I was thinking of this the other day...
In the "grand scheme of things" in Runeterra, where do all of the global ultimates such as Ashe's Enchanted Crystal Arrow, Jinx's Super Mega Death Rocket, or Ezreals Trueshot Barrage go when they go out of the rift in terms of lore? Is there just a massive area that's been destroyed after years of explosions?
I think it would be interesting to know!
Thanks,
og1764

replies.body:
"The Summonerâ€™s Rift is one of a few locations in Valoran where magical energy is at its greatest concentration, making it a highly sought-after locale to pursue magical endeavors." 

With this we can safely assume that their ultimates disintegrate when there is not enough magical energy to sustain them.

{{champion:22}} Ashe's Crystal arrow.
This has a range of 1.1 kilometres, before melting, and losing momentum. If it hits someone, it's going to injure, but not kill. It'd basically just become a fast moving popsicle with fading magic.

{{champion:81}} Ezreal's Trueshot barrage
After leaving the range of Ezreal's amulet, the magic fades.

{{champion:222}} Jinx's Super Mega Death Rocket
There's no cancel here, Jinx didn't install one. She doesn't care if she blows up a distant building now and then. The world is slowly crumbling due to bronze level Jinx's who can't hit the enemy, and instead hit a school or something tragic.

Runeterra is a horrible place to live. :/

Thanks for the quick reply.
So... is this canon now?
